title: Reactor Design
description:
The basic principles of reactor design are introduced, including material and energy balances for homogeneous and heterogeneous
systems.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CHBE 2140 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and CHBE 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and CHBE 3300 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
